statements: DELETE FROM gene_ontology WHERE gene_id = 1 AND go_term = 'cellular component';
DELETE FROM gene_ontology WHERE gene_name = 'GeneX' AND go_category = 'molecular function';
DELETE FROM gene_ontology WHERE go_category = 'biological process' AND go_definition LIKE '%DNA%'
DELETE FROM gene_data WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' AND go_term = 'XYZ';
DELETE FROM gene_go_mapping WHERE gene_id = 2 AND go_id = 4
DELETE FROM go_terms WHERE go_id IN (SELECT go_id FROM gene_go_mapping WHERE gene_id = 5)
DELETE FROM gene_go_mapping WHERE gene_id = 2 OR go_id = 7
DELETE FROM GeneGoMapping WHERE mapping_id IN (SELECT mapping_id FROM GeneGoAnnotation WHERE annotation_source = 'Manual');
DELETE FROM GeneInfo WHERE gene_id NOT IN (SELECT gene_id FROM GeneGoMapping);
DELETE FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 5 AND annotation_text = 'important';
DELETE FROM visualize_data WHERE visualization_id > 10 AND gene_id IN (SELECT gene_id FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE 'ABC%');
